Setup and package installation: 
```{r setup, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
install.packages(pkgs = c("BiocManager","dplyr"),
         repos = "http://cran.rstudio.org",
         dependencies = TRUE,
         quiet = TRUE)
library("GEOquery")
```

## Downloading dataset and supplementary files 
```{r data download, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
gset <- getGEO("GSE49800", GSEMatrix =TRUE, getGPL=FALSE)
sfiles = getGEOSuppFiles('GSE49800')

current_gpl <- names(GPLList(gset))[1]
current_gpl_info <- Meta(getGEO(current_gpl))
```
